__e: You never liked us, so we sure as hell don't like you!
And the whole thing was my idea, but I realized halfway through I didn't like it, and he really liked it, and he got all mad at me because I wasn't into it.
I really liked her, and I thought she really liked me.
I really loved her, nevertheless. But she was never satisfied, too complicated.
I never liked it. I told you, and you didn't listen. Because you're too busy being turned on by the risk.
I've never much liked my head, but I don't want to see it removed just yet.
Mommy knows what it is to be young and have people fond of her.
And when they're not around, you miss them not liking you.
Well, some of us don't relish being disliked.
Mommy knows what it is to be young and have people fond of her.
And when they're not around, you miss them not liking you.
Well, some of us don't relish being disliked.
I hear it is the thing to do to make people like you.
Or we can't be liked until we like ourselves.
I just wonder if you want people to like you a little too much.
It's been a while since I've had anyone who cared enough to give me grief.
You said that your dad liked to celebrate the little things, and I thought maybe we should start doing that too.
I mean, if it's any consolation, I don't think he ever really liked me anyway.
I seem to remember you were very taken with me.
Okay, I've never understood why you disliked him so much, but now I know it's because he knew what you'd done.
I was saying that I'm really glad... that y-you liked the picture I sent you.
